Trigger An enemy hits you with a Strike.

Requirements You're currently unable to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Shield] because you used @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Shield Block] with it.

You let your words defend you, just as your allies in the Vellumis Scholars defend through knowledge. You immediately cast shield and gain its bonus to AC even though you normally couldn't cast it, and you become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 1} for 1 round.
